tool_description: Extract any table from text just putting column names and text itself
name: Text2Table
title: Text2Table

api_list.name: pdf2text
api_list.description: Route for preprocessing PDF files. It gets text from specified pages of the provided file and splits the text into chunks if needed to prevent truncation at the /text2table request.

api_list.name: text_preprocessing
api_list.description: Route for preprocessing plain text. It split plain text in chunks if needed to prevent truncation at the /text2table request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text2table.p.rapidapi.com/t2t/text_preprocessing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text2table.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: web2text
api_list.description: Route for preprocessing web page content. It gets text from specified web page and splits the text into chunks if needed to prevent truncation at the /text2table request.
api_list.code:
